maxaifeaturization.selection package

Submodules

maxaifeaturization.selection.model_based_selector module

class maxaifeaturization.selection.model_based_selector.ModelBasedSelector(label_col: str, feature_col: str = 'features', output_col: str = 'selectedFeatures', base_model: str = 'SparkGBTClassifier', model_params: Optional[dict] = None, score: str = 'shap', n_features: int = 10)[source]

Bases: object

Class for selecting features based on shap or model fetaure importance. Class is designed to align with the pyspark feature selection apis

Parameters

  • label_col (str) – column which holds the target value

  • feature_col (str, optional) – col name of the feature vector col. Defaults to “features”.

  • output_col (str, optional) – output feature vector col name. Defaults to “selectedFeatures”.

  • base_model (str, optional) – base model to use for calculating feature imp. Defaults to “SparkGBTClassifier”.

  • model_params (dict, optional) – input params to the base model. Defaults to None.

  • score (str, optional) – type of feature imp score to use. Defaults to “shap”.

  • n_features (int, optional) – no of features to select. Defaults to 10.

Raises

  • Exception – if base model is not one of SparkGBTClassifier, SparkRFClassifier, SparkGBTRegressor or SparkRFRegressor

  • Exception – if score is one of shap or imp

static extract_feature_details(data, feature_col)[source]

method extracts the feature cols used to build the feature vector

Parameters

  • data (spark.Dataframe) – input dataframe for selecting features

  • feature_col (str) – feature vector col name

Raises

KeyError – if metadata is not available for feature vector

Returns

list of tuple with the feature names and id

Return type

list

property model
class maxaifeaturization.selection.model_based_selector.ModelBasedSelectorModel(feature_imp, n_features: int = 10, feature_col: str = 'features', output_col: str = 'selectedFeatures')[source]

Bases: object

Fitted class for ModelBasedSelectorModel. Class is designed to align with the pyspark feature selection apis

Parameters

  • feature_imp (pandas.Dataframe) – feature importance scores

  • n_features (int, optional) – no of features to select. Defaults to 10.

  • feature_col (str, optional) – col name of the feature vector col. Defaults to “features”.

  • output_col (str, optional) – output feature vector col name. Defaults to “selectedFeatures”.
